ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "Healthy, tangy and full of beans. This fast and easy salad is a breeze to make. Add cooked shrimp or chicken for a full meal, a jalapeno pepper for zing, or just enjoy the clean, fresh flavors. Perfect with grilled foods but hearty enough to stand on its own."
ins: Mix black beans, kidney beans, garbanzo beans, green bell pepper, red onion, cilantro, and celery in a large bowl. Add Italian dressing, lemon juice, salt, and pepper; toss to coat. Let stand about 5 minutes for flavors to blend. Chill if desired.
